name: translator-deepl-google
description: Text translation and language detection via provider client
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: translator_deepl_google
toolDefinition.description: Translate text, detect languages, batch translate, check usage, list supported languages, and manage glossaries via provider client (BYOK).

action.description: translate (translate text), detect_language (detect text language), translate_batch (translate multiple texts), get_usage (check API usage/quota), list_languages (list supported languages), get_glossaries (list glossaries)

text.description: Text to translate or detect language for. Required for translate and detect_language. Max 10000 chars for translate, 5000 for detect.

texts.description: Array of texts for batch translation. Required for translate_batch. Max 50 items, each max 5000 chars.

source_lang.description: Source language code (2-5 letters, e.g. 'en', 'de'). Optional, auto-detected if omitted.

target_lang.description: Target language code (2-5 letters, e.g. 'fr', 'es'). Required for translate and translate_batch.

formality.description: Formality level for translation. Optional, defaults to 'default'.
